meaningMnemonic: In a <radical>prison</radical> on the <radical>moon</radical> lies a <radical>treasure chest</radical> containing a golden <kanji>chest</kanji> piece. This mighty chest armor will grant you protection from nearly any attack, for it is imbued with moon magic.
readingMnemonic: Where is this <kanji>chest</kanji> armor from? It’s from the moon. Now how would you say that if you were Canadian? It’s from the <reading>moon, eh</reading> (むね). Right, this here chest armor is from the moon, eh.
